entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
